ygData.subject: Freeport Cleric Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all.  I don t want to be spoiled, just nudged =)  The very first cleric quest where it is my duty to refresh the sentries of the Temple of Marr still haunts
ygData.messageBody:
Hi all. I don't want to be spoiled, just nudged =) The very first cleric
quest where it is my duty to refresh the sentries of the Temple of Marr
still haunts me. I went to the ocean of tears to search for the remaining
sentry and retreated as I saw the island FULL of goblins. I am not a bit
higher in level and decided to complete this quest. Is she out there? or is
the quest broken?

btw: Sailing in the OOT, I went West (as I recall) and seemed to be headed
toward Kaladim, am I recalling wrong, or is something messed up besides me?
=)
